title: And a fire engine to go with the dog
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Ian Watson
brief_description: A writer on Gothic culture (Paul Chubb) forms a friendship with an emotionally unstable singer Elizabeth (Jo Kennedy), after she is thrown out of her flat.
